import _objectSpread from"C:/Users/User/Desktop/Estarta Training Program - ReactJs/Projects/estarta-blogger/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/objectSpread2.js";// Blogs Reducer Constants
import*as BLOGS_CONSTANTS from"./constants";// blogsReducer state
var initialState={blogs:[],loading:false,error:null,activeBlog:{}};// blogsReducer
var blogsReducer=function blogsReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case BLOGS_CONSTANTS.BLOGS_FETCH_DATA_REQUEST:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{loading:true});case BLOGS_CONSTANTS.BLOGS_FETCH_DATA_SUCCESS:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{blogs:action.payload,loading:false});case BLOGS_CONSTANTS.BLOGS_FETCH_DATA_FAILURE:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{loading:false,error:action.payload});case BLOGS_CONSTANTS.BLOGS_FETCH_DATA_SINGLE_BLOG_SUCCESS:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{loading:false,error:null,activeBlog:action.payload});case BLOGS_CONSTANTS.BLOGS_FETCH_DATA_SINGLE_BLOG_DELETE:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{loading:false,error:null,activeBlog:action.payload});default:return state;}};export default blogsReducer;
